## OWebKeyStorage.setItem() method

Sets an item to the key storage.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setItem(key: string, value: OJSONValue): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | The key name. |
|  value | OJSONValue | The key value. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
